properties.name: apikey
properties.label: API Key
properties.description: Hugging Face API key for the Inference (Router) API.

properties.name: headers
properties.description: Optional headers to include with requests.

properties.name: baseurl
properties.description: Optional base URL for the Hugging Face Inference API (leave blank to use default).

properties.name: hfprovider
properties.description: Optional inference provider for requests (e.g. auto, hf-inference, replicate, together). If unset, defaults to auto.

properties.name: conversational
properties.description: When true, use the Chat Completions API (messages-based) instead of plain text generation.
